title: A New Los Angeles Venue Will Open This Fall With a Set From Solomun
summary: The legend will take over the space for an outdoor show on Nov. 29.
body: A new Los Angeles venue will open its doors in high style this fall with a set from Solomun . The Bosnian-German dance titan will play Reframe Studios Outdoors on November 29, with California’s own Max Styler opening the show. The performance will mark the first event at Reframe Studios Outdoors, a never before used venue located on the grounds of Reframe Studios in the city’s Atwater Village neighborhood. The show is be produced by Los Angeles-based dance event leader Framework, which will continue doing shows at the venue after this debut. The performance will serve as the finale to Framework’s 2025 outdoor season.
